page.title: 15HOME LIFE.
page.content: I was woken at 6am by the alarm on my wristwatch & went to my desk to do some homework. While I finished it my Dad made me two slices of toast My Mum ironed my neckerchief for Cubs She washed my hair,when it was dry I went & played football with my brother until our Dad came to fetch us for dinner which was carrots,potatoes & cabbage.I don't eat meat. After dinner I put on my Cub uniform & got the Cub flag. I was to carry the flag at the St.George's Day parade at Central Hall Coventry. At 1.45 I met the Coventry Cub packs at the Coventry Poly. Coll.car park & marched to Central Hall. The flag bearers lined the stairs while the guests went in.Then we walked up the aisle with our flags,laid them against the wall & sat down. Afterwards we assembled with our flags & were dismissed.
